text:
[Player] and the others
passed through a nearby passageway
and moved to an empty warehouse.

options.text: Why are you at Summer Festa?
Is that a specially designed hero suit?

text:
The man who called himself Rokusei
took off his sunglasses and, in a carefree manner,
answered the questions.

name: Rokusei
text:
Now, now, don't rush. I'll
explain everything in order.
That's right, I once-

name: Huckle
text:
Rokusei-san, please be brief.
Don't forget that we have a mission
at Hero Festa.

name: Rokusei
text:
-No, no.
It's just a joke, just a joke!
Um, where should I start...?

name: Rokusei
text:
Let's start after [Player] finished
their business trip to Kyoto.
Until then, it's already shared within the company, right?

name: Huckle
text:
Business trip to Kyoto-
I see, so you were the person [Player]
was indebted to at that time.

name: Rokusei
text:
Oh, it's so easy to talk to someone who understands quickly,
this old man is so happy!
Though I'm the one who was indebted to them.

name: Rokusei
text:
Yes, after that "incident" in Kyoto,
I returned to "the organization I was staying at"-
and it was terrible.

name: Rokusei
text:
Of all things, they defiled the area
they consider sacred.
It was a huge mess with accountability and sanctions.

name: Rokusei
text:
That triggered various skirmishes
between large and small factions, and
even nearly caused an internal conflict.

name: Rokusei
text:
That organization is desperate to quell
the internal strife, so they are currently
in no condition to engage in external activities.

name: Rokusei
text:
It's convenient because it doesn't harm the public,
but, there were also some troublesome aspects.

name: Rokusei
text:
Because all surveillance shifted inwards,
my original objective... espionage,
has become much more difficult than before.

name: Rokusei
text:
So, for now, to show my obedience as an organization member,
I came here under the guise of
investigating the heroes' movements.

name: Rokusei
text:
I knew beforehand that "special hero suits"
would be introduced-

name: Rokusei
text:
So I thought it would be perfect for
moving around while hiding my true form,
and that's why I'm pretending to be a rookie.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's right!
I have reasons why I can't walk around the venue in my usual hero suit.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text: After all, this Summer Festa is hosted by a big company called Raidark, isn't it?

options.text: Is your usual suit that inconvenient?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Of course.
This Summer Festa is hosted by Raidark Co., right?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
…………….
Huckle-san, um, [Player], are you okay?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Is there any problem?
I'll explain it clearly later on my end.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, that's how it is...
President, you must be busy, too?
Um, I'll continue the story.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text: I had circumstances that prevented me from wanting to walk around Summer Festa in my original hero suit.

name: Rokusei
text:
It's hard to interfere with records
of events hosted by private companies,
not just battle live archives.

name: Rokusei
text:
Besides, [Player]'s
senior... Mokdai-kun, is a passionate
fan who knows my hero form.

name: Rokusei
text:
I wanted to avoid the commotion of
"Rare Hero Appearance!",
so I took this approach.

name: Rokusei
text:
The people in "the organization"
don't recognize me as anything
more than "labor."

name: Rokusei
text:
I want to take advantage of their lack of interest
and keep my hero identity a secret.

name: Rokusei
text:
So, during this event,
could you please treat me as a rookie hero?
I'm counting on you!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That would help me so much~ thank you!
I always feel indebted to you, I really do, trust me?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Come on, [Player].
Push a little harder?
Like, "It's okay, right?"
Say it together, one, two, three!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Senior delinquent operator!?
Hey, hey, are you okay with your subordinate saying such power-harassment things?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hahaha, [Player].
You shouldn't "pamper" rookie heroes too much.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
President Huckle, you're the type who can joke around too?
What a fun workplace~!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, my apologies.
I was almost swayed by your playful demeanor.

name: Huckle
text:
...Rokusei-san, may I ask you
one thing first?

After confirming that the person he was asking
nodded, Huckle continued speaking.

name: Huckle
text:
Regarding this Summer Festa,
is "either" of your affiliated
organizations involved?

name: Rokusei
text:
...No, neither is involved.
Though my answer has to be
"at least as far as I know."

name: Rokusei
text:
As I explained earlier, one side cannot act,
so the other side has no reason to move...
That's the situation.

name: Rokusei
text:
Should I, by any chance, spot
a member of either organization within this venue,
I will immediately contact you, President.

name: Huckle
text:
Thank you. For now, I can only hope
that no unforeseen accidents occur
during the Festa.

Huckle concludes that it's probably safe
to assume the festival will proceed
as usual this year.

Then, he extended his dominant hand forward,
intentionally changed his tone,
and showed his willingness to cooperate with Rokusei.

name: Huckle
text:
-Was it Rokusei-kun, the rookie?
Please take good care of our [Player].

name: Rokusei
text:
President Huckle... thank you!
You know, no matter how serious I act,
I always get suspected.

name: Rokusei
text:
It's extremely helpful to have connections
with someone who has
immense social credit, you know!

options.text: You could have just said 'nice to meet you'...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's perfectly fine, no worries!
This is truly a chance encounter, and I'm not planning anything at all.

options.text: That's a desperate way to rejoice.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Of course!
To navigate the world successfully, it's important to be trusted by others.

options.text: So that's why you are like that.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
W-w-what do you mean by that!?
Are you saying I talk too much?
Wow, I hear that a lot...

name: Huckle
text:
Hahaha, anyway, I'm glad
you're relying on us that much.

name: Huckle
text:
Including the Kyoto incident, it looks like
our company has "lent you a favor twice",
right?

name: Rokusei
text:
W-wow... Smiling and casually
putting pressure on me,
you really are a shrewd president.

name: Rokusei
text:
This old man will try to
not get too carried away,
hahaha...

name: Huckle
text:
Hehe, well, I'm just half-joking.
But it's probably not a bad idea for
the both of us to stay sharp.

name: Huckle
text:
Now... it's about time we head back to the site.
The citizens are probably eagerly awaiting
our encounter, aren't they, Rokusei-kun?

While [Player] and Huckle were
listening to Rokusei's circumstances,
the venue was already bustling with many visitors.

name: Canes
text:
Whoa... it's huge!
This is the Hero Festa venue.
What's that building, it's enormous~!!

name: Canes
text:
I wonder if Muirauka I will look
like this once development progresses.
How long will it take?

name: Sterio
text:
Earth's ground is different.
There are parts that aren't dirt, what's this?
Stone floor? It's pretty with all the colors!

name: Canes
text:
Urban roads, they say, are paved like this
to make them easy to walk on in any environment,
whether it rains or dries.

name: Canes
text:
Even on our planet, the residential areas
have reasonably well-maintained roads.
This is like a much grander version of that.

name: Sterio
text:
Sniff sniff... smells delicious.
Are there lots of food over there?
Canes, let's go, full speed!

name: Canes
text:
Listen to my explanation for a bit!
And you just ate, didn't you?
Let's look around the venue first.

Canes opens the guide map he received
at the venue entrance on his device,
checking his current location and surrounding buildings.

name: Canes
text:
Um, that's the stadium-
Hey, look, Sterio! That person over there,
isn't that a real hero!?

name: Sterio
text:
Where, where... It's really him~!
I've seen him in live streams!
Canes, should we go closer? Get an autograph?

name: Canes
text:
Let's just go closer for now.
I didn't expect to meet a hero
so soon-

The two rush towards the hero.
The surrounding visitors also gather
one after another in front of the stadium.

name: Canes
text:
Ugh... there are too many people.
I can't see anything at my height.
Sterio, what's going on up front?

name: Sterio
text:
Customers are surrounding the hero,
and customers are surrounding them, and around them...
Awooo!? Someone fell down!

Despite how crowded it was,
people dispersed like ripples
around the fallen visitor.

name: Canes
text:
Are you okay!?
Maybe the heat got to them... Sterio,
let's carry this person to the shade!

name: Loren
text:
-Wait, don't move them!
I'll examine that person. You two,
go call a nearby staff member!

name: Sterio
text:
Roger that!
Staff-san, where are youuu!?

The person at the center of the crowd was,
by chance, Loren, who belongs to the hero agency
M.A.H.A, which consists of medical professionals.

name: Loren
text:
...For now, this should be fine.
But I'm not a doctor,
so let's have them checked properly.

name: Loren
text:
Staff-san, please escort
them to the infirmary.

name: Venue Staff
text:
Understood!
Please wait a moment!

Loren exhales and relaxes,
then thanks the boys.

name: Loren
text:
Thank you for your help!
You rushed to the fallen person
just like heroes!

name: Loren
text:
Thanks to you, I was able to treat them smoothly.
I'll tell that customer about your good work
when they feel better.

name: Loren
text:
Well, I need to head to the infirmary too.
I'll leave the rest to you,
please enjoy Hero Festa!

name: Canes
text:
Ah... yes,
thank you very much.
Please tell them to take care!

name: Sterio
text:
Hehehe~
they said we were
like heroes~!

name: Canes
text:
...But I couldn't do anything special.
The hero treated them, and Sterio
brought the staff member.

name: Canes
text:
I wish I could have asked that person
a lot of questions... but that's impossible, I guess.
Sterio, let's look for another hero.

Sterio pushes through the crowd.
Canes, curiously observing the excited people around him,
follows behind his brother.

Leaving the stadium and walking further into the
Hero Festa venue,
crowds and lines can be seen everywhere.

name: Canes
text:
Haaah~... it's amazing.
This is the most people I've seen
since going to Estevolta with Dad.

Even if they found other heroes,
customers would always flock around them,
making it impossible for them to get close.

As they stopped, wondering what to do,
a staff member called out to them.

name: Apprentice Hero
text:
Hello there!
Welcome to Hero Festa,
is there anything you need help with?

name: Canes
text:
Ah, um... hello.
I want to talk to a hero,
how can I do that?

name: Apprentice Hero
text:
You mean greetings!
For those with set times,
you'll need to line up.

name: Apprentice Hero
text:
Otherwise, you can directly approach
heroes walking around the venue!
Like me, for example!

name: Canes
text:
Eh, you're a hero too?
Sorry, I didn't realize it...

name: Apprentice Hero
text:
No, no, it's natural not to know.
I'm not transformed right now,
and I'm still an apprentice.

Canes nods in agreement with the staff member's
words, saying "Is that so?". At that moment,
his brother's voice comes from above his head.

name: Sterio
text:
Hey, hey, Canes. Does this person
know how to become a hero?
Let's ask them.

name: Canes
text:
...You're right.
Excuse me, it's sudden, but
how can I become a hero?

name: Apprentice Hero
text:
Oh, in that case, you can obtain a hero license
and belong to an agency to become a hero. Also-

name: Apprentice Hero
text:
Whoa, a call from headquarters!
Sorry, I have to go even though we're in the middle of talking.
Please excuse me.

name: Canes
text:
Get a license and belong to an agency, huh?
Becoming a hero is surprisingly easy-
No, that's not true.

name: Sterio
text:
License, I don't know that.
Canes, do you know what it means?

name: Canes
text:
It's a permit, a license.
It's like proof that this person
is a hero.

name: Canes
text:
Ah, I'm sure there's a really difficult test
to get a license, or
the conditions are strict.

name: Sterio
text:
Then, then, should we ask
how to get a license?
Let's look for other heroes!

name: Canes
text:
Yeah, let's do that.
I hope we can meet a hero
who can tell us in detail.

Chapter 2:
A Chance Encounter, Another Life's Connection

[Player] and the others, who had finished
their conversation with Tsuneaki- now Rokusei-
returned to the venue through the passageway.

options.text: Will I get recognized during greetings?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I think it'll be fine.
As long as I don't encounter customers with as much knowledge as your senior, that is.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text: Even if I did, my appearance is different, so they'll probably just recognize me as an unknown rookie.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text: That's right, as a rookie hero, maybe I should proactively appeal to the customers?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text: This old man is used to dealing with fans in public, so this is nothing new.

options.text: I'm not good with customer service...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's okay, [Player].
Leave dealing with customers entirely to this old man.

name: Rokusei
text:
Well, even so, there probably aren't many
customers who would jump
at an unknown hero, huh? Hahaha!

The moment Rokusei laughed brightly,
a huge shadow leapt in like a bullet
with great force.

name: Sterio
text:
Awoo~!
I caught a hero!

name: Canes
text:
You did it, Sterio!
Hey, mister,
this is a hero, right?

name: Huckle
text:
Eh, ah, yes?
This Rokusei-kun is a hero.
...You two are very energetic, aren't you?

options.text: That mister over there is a hero too...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...[Player].
How about we focus on the rookie hero first?

options.text: Do you know who this person is!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Stop it, how embarrassing...!
It's not surprising if you don't know me, as I've been out of commission for quite a while.

name: Rokusei
text:
Guh... y-you, could you release me first?
My body feels like it's going to break in half...

name: Sterio
text:
Whoa!? Sorry, we were looking for heroes
and we've been walking around for a long time,
so we didn't want to let you go...

name: Canes
text:
Sorry for suddenly rushing you,
as my brother said, we've been walking
around the venue for a while, but-

name: Canes
text:
Every hero was surrounded by so many people,
it seemed like there was no time
for them to listen to us.

Rokusei, now freed,
rubs his back and says, "I see",
showing understanding for the boys' situation.

name: Rokusei
text:
What do you want to ask?
From your demeanor, it doesn't seem like
you're just looking for my autograph.

name: Rokusei
text:
If it's something a rookie like me knows,
I'll answer as much as I can.

Hearing Rokusei's words,
Canes's expression brightened instantly.

name: Canes
text:
Thank you very much!
You did it, Sterio, it's all thanks to you
catching Rokusei-san!

name: Sterio
text:
I'm a hunting dog, so I'm happy
to be useful to you even when
it's not hunting-related, Canes~!

options.text: The smiles of the youth are blinding!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What are you talking about?
From my perspective, [Player], you still seem pretty young, you know?

name: Canes
text:
Oh, I'm sorry!
Come to think of it, we
haven't even introduced ourselves yet.

name: Canes
text:
I'm Canes, and this is
my brother Sterio.
We came all the way from Muirauka I.

The "brothers",
a human-type alien and a beast-type alien,
bow politely side by side.

name: Huckle
text:
Muirauka I... that was a planet currently
under development in that star system, wasn't it?
You've come all this way to Earth.

name: Sterio
text:
You're smart!
We Space Hunters are responsible for protecting everyone
from dangerous creatures on developing planets.

name: Canes
text:
H-hey! That's rude, Sterio.
I'm so sorry for his impolite language.
But you really are knowledgeable, um-

name: Huckle
text:
I'm Huckle. And next to me is
my subordinate, [Player].
We're currently observing heroes.

options.text: Canes-kun, you're so serious and cute~

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You can just call me Canes.
And please don't call me cute.
I'm not a small child.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Saying things like that, you're just trying to act grown up, child-
Never mind, sorry, don't glare at me!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sterio
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's okay to call me by my name.
[Player], are you scared of big things?
I'm gentle, no worries!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Siblings of different races, huh...
They seem so close, that's nice.
This old man is envious!

name: Canes
text:
By the way, Huckle-san.
What does "observing heroes" mean?

name: Huckle
text:
Heroes can transform into their usual
hero suit appearance when an "Observer"
"approves" them.

name: Huckle
text:
And to maintain that appearance,
the "Observer" needs to keep
observing the hero.

name: Canes
text:
Is that so? So that means,
[Player], are you the "Observer"!?
…………….

name: Both
text: -Awesome~!!

name: Canes
text:
Actually, we came to this Hero Festa
because we wanted to know
how to become heroes!

name: Sterio
text:
"Observer", how can you
make heroes transform?
Can we transform too?

name: Canes
text:
Rokusei-san, how did you
become a hero?
When did you first transform!?

options.text: Those are difficult questions to answer...
You want to be a hero that much?

name: Rokusei
text:
Stoop! Canes-kun, Sterio-kun,
I understand very well that you want to be heroes,
so let's calm down.

Canes apologizes bashfully.
After a breather, Rokusei
answers the boys' questions.

name: Rokusei
text:
About how to become a hero,
well, putting aside the procedures and
all the troublesome stuff-

name: Rokusei
text:
First, you have to transform into a hero's form,
but that's, well, hard to explain.

name: Rokusei
text:
Simply put, it's about an "Observer"
connecting a "path" to a hero's strong dreams
and wishes, or something like that.

name: Canes
text:
Strong dreams and wishes?
…………….

name: Sterio
text:
I want to be a hero.
Is that a wish?
Can the "Observer" make it happen?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sterio
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Uuuuuugh...
I want to be a hero, I want to be a hero, I want to be a hero...
How about now?
Still no transformation?

text:
[Player] looks at the screen of the device
attached to their arm.

However, no message indicating
a new path has appeared.

name: Canes
text:
Is that so...?
As I thought, it's not that easy
to become a hero.

Canes muttered disappointedly.
Seeing the two's dejection,
Huckle spoke up.

name: Huckle
text:
Besides the greeting staff,
heroes from various agencies are participating
in Hero Festa.

name: Huckle
text:
How about asking them about their experiences?
They might even tell you hints
that we don't know.

name: Canes
text:
……………!
I see, that's a good idea.
I'll ask a lot of people!

name: Sterio
text:
Ask heroes, understood!
Canes, who are we catching next?

name: Rokusei
text:
Whoa, wait, wait!
You shouldn't pounce on them
like you did on me earlier!

name: Rokusei
text:
Hmm... alright.
This old man will escort you
and introduce you to other heroes.

name: Canes
text:
Really!?
Yay, thank you!

Rokusei stops Sterio, who is about to bolt,
and offers to guide them himself.

Without the boys, who are delighted
by the unexpected turn of events noticing,
[Player] quietly spoke to the proposer.

options.text: So I'll be going with them too...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Sorry, I decided it on my own.
But I thought you would agree, [Player].

options.text: Is it okay to make such a casual promise?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's fine!
This old man, though he may not look like it,
he's actually really serious about his work.
I've thoroughly scouted the venue too.

options.text: Are you interested in these two?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Oh, you figured it out?
I can't keep any secrets from you anymore, [Player].

name: Rokusei
text:
A human-type and a beast-type alien,
recognizing each other as "brothers"
and dreaming of the same future together-

name: Rokusei
text:
For me, their existence
is incredibly interesting.
I'd like to observe them a little more.

Recalling his own youth and the region
where he grew up, Rokusei speaks.

A relationship where different races cooperate.
A connection that was utterly unthinkable
at that time, in that place-

Rokusei's interest was drawn to the boys,
who were naturally realizing
that relationship.

name: Rokusei
text:
Canes-kun, Sterio-kun.
Nice to meet you again.
If there's any hero you want to meet-

Just as Rokusei was about to say that, several
people in hero suits appeared and
surrounded [Player] and the others.

name: Heroes
text: Surprise Hero Show!

name: All
text: Surprise Hero Show!?

name: Venue Broadcast
text:
Everyone who came to the venue,
are you enjoying Hero Festa?

name: Venue Broadcast
text:
Suddenly, the apprentice heroes
who will be running around the venue
will challenge active heroes to a battle!

name: Venue Broadcast
text:
Now, find out where the battle begins
by searching inside the venue!
Alright, start!

options.text: So this is why an "Observer" was needed...

dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player] stands behind Rokusei
for the operation. However-

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
So this is the battle the organizers explained beforehand... I see.
I'm ready anytime-

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text: No, I'm not the hero in charge of greetings, so please treat me as if I'm not here-

name: Huckle
text:
-Wait, Rokusei-kun.
Can you still use your usual
Parallel Weapon with that suit?

name: Rokusei
text:
I don't intend to show it publicly, you know?
If I show "that",
my identity might be revealed.

name: Rokusei
text:
Just watch, President.
I'll show you another fighting style
I was trained in at my agency!

After answering, Rokusei
clenches his fist and assumes a martial arts stance.

name: Canes
text:
Eh, what's this?
Are they doing a hero show here!?

name: Sterio
text:
Will we be on the live stream?
Papa, Mama, look~!

name: Huckle
text:
Canes-kun, Sterio-kun.
Let's move together.
Let's get away from the heroes.

The two visitors, appealing to the flying
drone cameras, follow Huckle's lead.

name: Apprentice Hero
text:
Hey... have you ever
seen a hero like that in a broadcast?

name: Apprentice Hero
text:
He's probably an apprentice like us,
or a rookie who just debuted this year.
That's just perfect, isn't it?

name: Apprentice Hero
text:
Sorry to them, but
it's time to show off our teamwork
and appeal our abilities-!?

Perhaps due to overconfidence in being multiple against one,
the apprentices exchange whispered conversations
during the battle.

Rokusei instantly rushes towards
one of them, who has a particularly large opening,
and strikes with a palm heel strike.

The attacked apprentice
couldn't guard in time and
was blown back forcefully.

name: Rokusei
text:
How about that!
This is my physical ability,
trained at the agency-

name: Rokusei
text: -Whoa!?

With a sound like something bursting,
the hero suit of the "attacker"
is severely damaged.

options.text: The suit flew off from the recoil?

name: Rokusei
text:
What is this hero suit,
what's going on!?

name: Apprentice Hero
text:
Eh... what was that, scary...
My suit broke on its own,
is that a kind of fan service?

name: Apprentice Hero
text:
I don't know, but it's our chance!
Now's the time to show off
our true abilities!

name: Rokusei
text:
Whoa, wait, I can't battle like this, can I?
If I move any more, I won't be able to
stand in front of the customers like this!

name: Sterio
text:
Rokusei, in a pinch?
He just knocked down one hero,
so why?

name: Canes
text:
Was that part of the show?
Like in wrestling, adding entertainment
in the middle of a serious match?

name: Huckle
text:
Oh dear...
You two wait here.
I'm going to "help out" a bit.

Huckle calls out to Canes and Sterio, who are watching,
and waves his hands at the apprentices
to temporarily halt the battle.

name: Huckle
text:
...I'm sure the organizers will understand
if I say it's a response to an accident.
Now-

name: Huckle
text:
-Rokusei-kun, I'll take over
the rest of the show.
[Player], I'm counting on you.

name: Hopper
text:
Embraced by the sky, riding the wind!
A traveler who roams the wide world!
Hopper the Face, here I come!!

name: All
text: -Whoa~!!

name: Canes
text:
That old man was Hopper!?
I've seen him in broadcasts so many times.
Awesome... he's a real veteran hero!

name: Apprentice Hero
text:
What, no way, it's really Hopper?
The former S-rank hero?
Justice's partner!?

name: Apprentice Hero
text:
Wait, wait, I can't believe this,
it was my dream to work on the same site
as that person!

At the unexpected appearance of the veteran,
everyone present shouts with joy.

name: Hopper
text:
Sorry for the wait.
Now-it's time for a player change,
come at me from anywhere!
Battle Start

name: Apprentice Heroes
text: It was a pleasure knowing you!

name: Venue Broadcast
text:
Surprise Hero Live has ended!
Thank you for watching and cheering!

name: Venue Broadcast
text:
After this, the O-1 Grand Prix matches
will begin at the Hero Stadium.
Please come and join us!

When the battle ended, a large crowd
of visitors rushed over and applauded
the heroes with thunderous applause.

dialogue_after_selection.text: Although [Player]'s call was not heard, Huckle was already waving to the surrounding visitors with a smile.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text:
President!?
Oh no, I think we were really rude to someone important...
Sterio, you too!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sterio
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Canes, should we apologize later?
I'll apologize with you.
[Player] uses the gathered ViewPower to repair Rokusei's hero suit.

text:
The observing visitors gradually disperse,
and the opposing apprentices one after another
ask Huckle for handshakes and autographs.

After they're done, they gather around [Player]
along with Rokusei, who has been completely
left out.

name: Rokusei
text:
Whoa~... they completely
stole my thunder!?
And what was that accident?

name: Rokusei
text:
That was definitely planned,
but if so, they could have
explained it beforehand.

name: Canes
text:
Rookie heroes have to do things like that too...
Rokusei-san, that must be tough.

name: Sterio
text:
It's okay, cheer up!
Rokusei's first hit
was super powerful!

name: Rokusei
text:
Thank you both...
But being pitied and encouraged by customers,
I feel like I'm losing my status as a hero!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yes, that's right!
As expected of [Player], you say good things!

options.text: Well, there are different ways to be active.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'd rather avoid standing out like this...
But if the customers are happy, then it's fine.

options.text: It was the best in terms of attention.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'd rather avoid standing out like this...
But if the customers are happy, then it's fine.

name: Rokusei
text:
Besides, performing brilliantly in battle
isn't the only job of a hero.

name: Canes
text:
I sort of understand that.
Our "family" business also has
other things to do besides hunting.

name: Sterio
text:
Tool maintenance, setting traps,
and also, effective use of hunted creatures...
There are many other things.

The boys try to understand Rokusei's words
by imagining them in terms of familiar things
and their own experiences.

Huckle, having untransformed,
watches them and speaks with deep emotion.

name: Huckle
text:
You two perceive heroes
as just one of many professions,
don't you?

name: Huckle
text:
Well, since heroes have been everywhere
since you were born,
it's natural to think that way.

name: Huckle
text:
No offense, I'm not trying to act like a veteran.
But I feel that times have changed, and
your way of thinking is different from when I was young.

name: Canes
text:
Is that...
so?

Huckle speaks, looking back at what he was doing
when he was the same age as the boys
he's now talking to.

The adults were speaking with fondness for the past
and warmly watching over the young people living in the present,
but-

Canes, who was listening intently,
lowered his eyebrows worriedly and
hesitantly asked Huckle.

name: Canes
text:
Um, Huckle-san.
Truthfully, do we not have the
qualifications to transform into heroes?

name: Canes
text:
Given what Rokusei-san just taught us about
"strong dreams and wishes"-

name: Canes
text:
I thought it might not be something you can become
just by having the desire to "become one."
The device isn't working either...

options.text: It's too early to give up.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text: Yes, I agree with [Player]'s opinion, Canes-kun, Sterio-kun.

options.text: Honestly, I can't say for sure.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text: Ah... sorry, I used strange language with someone older than me.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hahaha, it's fine.
[Player], don't tease the customers too much, okay?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's too early to draw conclusions based solely on what happened today.
You should observe a little longer.

name: Rokusei
text:
By the way, you two,
should I assume you're planning to
stay for the Hero Festa for the entire duration?

name: Sterio
text:
That's the plan!
We just arrived on Earth today.
We'll stay until the end of the Festa!

name: Rokusei
text:
I see. Well then, first,
enjoy this Hero Festa
as a festival!

name: Rokusei
text:
And if you like, let's meet again tomorrow.
As I said earlier, I'll introduce
you to other heroes.

name: Huckle
text:
Hmm... in that case, I'll
inform my staff today.

name: Huckle
text:
We have a food stall in the food area,
so if you're interested, come visit.
You can try some delicious Earth food.

name: Canes
text:
Really!?
Thank you very much, Rokusei-san,
Huckle-san, [Player]!

name: Canes
text:
By the way, we suddenly intruded
and talked for so long,
we're sorry... Come on, Sterio too!

name: Sterio
text:
Sorry~!
Thank you everyone for being
kind to Canes!

Canes and Sterio
bow deeply again to the adults
who listened to their consultation.

options.text: It's okay, it's also part of the job.
Let's talk a lot tomorrow too.

text:
Rokusei sighs lightly
as he watches the two walk
towards another area of the venue.

name: Rokusei
text:
Goodness, right from the start,
I met some intense
customers.

name: Rokusei
text:
My apologies, [Player],
President Huckle. I unilaterally
decided the arrangements.

name: Huckle
text:
No, I apologize too.
Although we can cooperate, their escort
will probably be entirely up to you.

name: Rokusei
text:
That's an easy task.
This old man is used to
working with boys.

options.text: Leave the observation and support to me.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Thank you, [Player].
I'll take you up on your offer and rely on you.

options.text: I'm curious about those two too...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, really?
Well, they are a rare pair, aren't they?
And their family business is Space Hunter, too.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Canes-kun, was it?
He seems a bit too serious and reckless sometimes.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text: Hahaha, if you like it that much, Ryekie will be happy too.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Including the customers' portions, you can expense tomorrow's lunch.
Of course, within reason.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh~ food on a business trip is good, isn't it?
Last time, it was out of my own pocket, so I'm even more grateful!

name: Huckle
text:
Now... I'm going to
the Hero Festa management office.

name: Huckle
text:
I have to explain
how I suddenly participated in the
hero live show earlier.

name: Huckle
text:
Well then, please continue your duties after this.
If I can, I'll also drop by
our food stall tomorrow.

After parting with Huckle,
[Player] and Rokusei
slowly move around the venue.

They wave back to children occasionally,
and escort lost visitors
to their desired locations.

Suddenly, looking towards the coast,
they see Canes and Sterio,
whom they had just parted with.

The two, despite their vastly different physiques,
walk naturally side-by-side,
neither adjusting to the other.

Rokusei watches their heartwarming scene
with a somewhat lonely expression,
then walks away from the coast.
